doc:
Donald Richards https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Richards 0 Donald Richards (March 24, 1919 - September 26, 1953) was an American singer and actor. He is best known in his short career for having created the role of Woody Mahoney in Finian's Rainbow. Richards was born in New York City and died in a road accident in Ridgewood, New Jersey. Donald_Richards ( March_24_,_1919 - September_26_,_1953 ) was an_American_singer_and_actor . He is_best_known in his_short_career for having_created the_role of Woody_Mahoney in Finian 's_Rainbow . Richards was_born in New_York_City and died in a_road_accident in Ridgewood , New_Jersey .
